title: 求助CraftTweaker2 报错！！！
txt_content:
我明明按照教程来的，实在搞不懂Script：
print ("Initializing ElixirScript");
recipes.addShaped(<minecraft:diamond>,
        [[<minecraft:iron_ingot>, <minecraft:iron_ingot>,<minecraft:iron_ingot>],
        [null, null, null],
        [null, null, null]]
        );


print ("Initialized ElixirScript")



报错：
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][INFO] CraftTweaker: Building registry
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][INFO] CraftTweaker: Successfully built item registry
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][INFO] Loading scripts
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][INFO] [crafttweaker | SIDE_CLIENT]: Loading Script: {[0:crafttweaker]: MinecraftOrigin\GetElixir.zs}
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][ERROR] [crafttweaker | SIDE_CLIENT]: Error loading {[0:crafttweaker]: MinecraftOrigin\GetElixir.zs}: java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException

replies.txt_content: 最后一行少了分号 print ("Initialized ElixirScript")改为print ("Initialized ElixirScript");
